It is understood that between 2011-2013, Mou bridge has three related to public officials bribes totaling 130,000 yuan of

money.1 Minaret Street Yuexiu District Public Security Bureau police station Huangmou Chuan (handled separately)Limou Bridge said that in 2012, its acceptance without the fire in order to allow the building to rental profit Jianye not been investigated, has five Huisong "commission" total cash 91,000 yuan.2 former Deputy Director of Guangzhou Municipal Bureau of Justice mediation Lin Tree Management Office (handled separately)From 2011 to 2013, Li Mou Jianye Building bridges to solve a small group of owners to petition and make an inventory of Jianye Building uncompleted rehabilitation matters, has six times its Huisong "commission" for a total cash value of 26,000 yuan and 5,000 yuan shopping card .3 Guangzhou Municipal Construction Committee, Deputy Director of real estate development and construction at Yaomou Xiang (handled separately)From 2011 to 2013, Li Mou Jianye Building nike air max 90 baratas bridges to solve a small group of owners to petition and make an inventory of Jianye Building uncompleted rehabilitation matters, twice its Huisong commissions totaling 3,000 yuan in cash, the value of 5000 yuan shopping card.According to previous news bulletin Guangzhou Municipal Procuratorate, in addition to the above three public officers involved in the case, as well as traffic Yuexiu District Public Security Bureau, former deputy chief of the fire brigade from the bridge and Senior Staff Chen and Huang Moufeng Minaret Street police station Three suspects, but three did not appear in the indictment in the case yesterday.In addition, the investigation, between April 2012 to December next year, as the defendant Jin Moulian circuit Jianye Building Maintenance electrician. December 2013, Jianye Building, in the

transformation of the line, because the calculation error, use two 6 square lines are connected to the warehouse located at the north gate Dengmou above (ie 16 square line), which later led to APB Building total power line short circuit ignited fires and other combustible materials.Trial Watch Developer: Rent a monthly income of 300,000 is not enough to repayYesterday in court, the first to be examined Limou bridge, which said that since 1997, he is the actual control Jianye Building, Jianye Building was due to funding strand breaks, permanent power engineering construction is not completed, the building fire inspection failed to pass, eventually leading to the building unfinished. It said the company believed the dragon and Shinano Jianye Building companies are established in order to manage, and will then be responsible for the daily work of five people, Li Mousheng general manager, Explorer, fire safety, nike air max 1 comprar security, water and electricity, his son Limou Hung on assisted Lee, and another five or six security.Its says registration purposes Jianye Building is a commercial, probably two or three thousand square meters of leased Shoes boss to use as a warehouse, once after being checked by firefighting punishment to stop using, and later because of the need to revitalize, in turn lease the building for storage used to fire.
